name: WebPolicyDecisionListener
desc: This protocol enables WebView policy delegates to communicate with listener objects. A listener object conforming to this protocol is passed as one of the arguments to web view policy delegate methods.

items.name: func download()
items.desc: Tells the listener to download the resource instead of displaying it.

items.name: func ignore()
items.desc: Tells the listener to ignore the resource.

items.name: func use()
items.desc: Tells the listener to use the resource.
